abstract: Mirroring protests in New York's financial district and elsewhere in the United States, a group of activists said they would gather in front of the London Stock Exchange on Saturday to highlight "social and economic injustice."
snippet: Mirroring protests in New York's financial district and elsewhere in the United States, a group of activists said they would gather in front of the London Stock Exchange on Saturday to highlight "social and economic injustice."
lead_paragraph: LONDON - The Occupy Wall Street protests are spreading to London.

headline.main: Wall Street Protests Inspire London Offshoot
